attributes.action: introduce legislation to make it an offence attracting automatic and mandatory life imprisonment - without the opportunity of parole - to make jokes about 'bombs in my bags' and 'my bags were packed by Osama Bin Laden' when being processed by security staff at UK airports.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who joke about these things during these times show a distinct lack of awareness about our situation and need to be taken out of the loop forever, as a warning to others who might also wish to make jokes about the most serious situation currently affecting the planet, short of the debacle of Tony Blair becoming President of the EU!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
